definition: just in case/if by any chance/contingency
surname Wan
ten thousand/a great number
one/1/single/a (article)/as soon as/entire/whole/all/throughout/"one" radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 1)/also pr. [yao1] for greater clarity when spelling out numbers digit by digit
to guard against the unexpected (idiom); just in case/prepared for any eventualities
better to be safe than sorry (proverb)/to be prepared just in case
pinyin: bu4 pa4 yi1 wan4 , jiu4 pa4 wan4 yi1

sentences.english: If you think he is a good man, think again.
sentences.chinese: 萬一你以爲他是善人，那你就大謬不然了。

sentences.english: He was worried about what might happen if they leaked out information.
sentences.chinese: 他擔心萬一他們走漏了風聲會出什麼事。

sentences.english: Raj :Oh, we should have a plan in case one of us gets lucky.
sentences.chinese: 噢，我們得制定個計劃以防萬一我們中有誰走桃花運。

sentences.english: But she kept overfeeding her cat just in case.
sentences.chinese: 但是她一直過量地喂着她的貓，以防萬一。

sentences.english: These were extra wedges in case they should be needed.
sentences.chinese: 這些額外的木楔是以防萬一的。

sentences.english: Have some candles at hand in case lights fuse .
sentences.chinese: 手邊準備點蠟燭，萬一保險絲燒斷了。

sentences.english: In circumstance of, if have what matter confuse, be a then it possible to be life it loses.
sentences.chinese: 萬一，要是有什麼事打攪了，那便可能是性命之失。

sentences.english: I will never marry another man if you should die before me.
sentences.chinese: 萬一你比我先死的話，我決不會再嫁給其他的男人。

sentences.english: Never shut down you mobile, in case of I am sick , I need you take me to hosipital , stay with me.
sentences.chinese: 唔好關機，萬一半夜我有事要去急症室我想你陪住我。

sentences.english: We haudio-videoe an auxiliary generator in case of power cuts.
sentences.chinese: 我們有一臺萬一斷電時運用的備用發電機。

sentences.english: With the car, if left behind is not the speed chase.
sentences.chinese: 而跟車，萬一掉隊了也不要超速追趕。

sentences.english: Be more careful not to miss once than to hit a hundred times.
sentences.chinese: 多加小心，避免萬一失手勝過百發百中。

sentences.english: Tung and Fong continued their vigil , hoping against hope.
sentences.chinese: 董和方繼續守護着，抱着萬一的希望。

sentences.english: If swallowed immediately sent to hospital.
sentences.chinese: 萬一吞下請立即送院就醫。

sentences.english: I took the precaution of locking money in the safe.
sentences.chinese: 我把所有的錢都鎖在保險箱裏以防萬一。

definition: can't say for sure/maybe
if not/otherwise/else/or else
anxious/worried/uneasy/to worry/to be anxious
danger/dangerous
inconvenient/troublesome/annoying/to trouble or bother sb/to put sb to trouble
at any time/at all times/at the right time
in the future/future/the future/CL:個|个[ge4]
surname Ying
to agree (to do sth)/should/ought to/must/(legal) shall
to answer/to respond/to comply with/to deal or cope with
outcome/result/conclusion/in the end/as a result/to kill/to dispatch
to bear fruit/CL:個|个[ge4]
(posing a question: whether sb, something) can or cannot?/is able to or not
condition/state/situation/CL:個|个[ge4]
to say again/to put off a discussion until later/moreover/what's more/besides
improbable/unlikely/will not (act, happen etc)/not able/not having learned to do sth/(coll.) (Tw) don't mention it/not at all
in a word/in short/in brief
after all/all in all/when all is said and done/in the final analysis
to estimate/to reckon/CL:個|个[ge4]/(coll.) to suppose
